sentences.sContent: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.sCn: 他经常讲演及写小册子支持自由贸易。

sentences.sContent: If even she is now in favour of political compromise with the Taliban, what choice does the west really have but to listen?
sentences.sCn: 如果说就连她都能在如今支持政府同塔利班和解，我们这群西方人除了倾听还需要做些什么呢？
